sections.heading: services bureau; purposes.The purposes of the transportation services bureau are to centralize title to and insure efficient utilization and proper maintenance of all state-owned vehicles, to rent passenger vehicles from a third-party fleet primarily for transporting state employees from one job loc
sections.text: services bureau; purposes.The purposes of the transportation services bureau are to centralize title to and insure efficient utilization and proper maintenance of all state-owned vehicles, to rent passenger vehicles from a third-party fleet primarily for transporting state employees from one job location to another, and to provide vehicle transportation services to all state agencies, boards, and commissions.SourceLaws 1981, LB 381, ยง 39;Laws 2012, LB779, ยง 2.
